_comment0_: Tests from the issues discovered in ClearspeakEnglish rules.
name: EnglishClearspeakIssues

Issue230_1.expected: <?xml version="1.0"?><speak version="1.1" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/10/synthesis" xml:lang="en"><prosody rate="100%"> <mark name="0"/> 5 <mark name="3"/> and <break time="250ms"/> <mark name="1"/> 3 <mark name="2"/> over 224 <break time="250ms"/> </prosody></speak>
